snippet: Even without facing Rafael Nadal, the United States is on the brink of elimination by Spain, the defending Davis Cup champion.
abstract: United States is on the brink of elimination by Spain, the defending Davis Cup champion; Sam Querrey and John Isner lose their matches, giving Spain a 2-0 lead in semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Even without facing Rafael Nadal, the United States is on the brink of elimination by Spain, the defending Davis Cup champion.

headline.main: U.S. Trails Spain in Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. Trails Spain in Davis Cup
